availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathaniel Shaw (Lexington hat maker, brother of Hiram Shaw.)

body.p: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, resident. Lexington, Kentucky native. Married to Emma Marsh Shaw. Father of Catherine Shaw, Hiram Shaw, Emma Shaw, Julia Shaw, Annie Shaw and Margaret Shaw. Resident of Lexington, Fayette County in 1840.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 111
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 370
Find A Grave, "Name (Birth-Death)," Memorial #98130911, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/98130911 (accessed January 4, 2019).
